display_long_description:
Sky Stunt Racer is an exhilarating VR racing game for Oculus Quest 2 and 3, delivering a unique experience of high-speed driving on tracks floating in the sky! Take the wheel of powerful cars and navigate gravity-defying courses filled with sharp turns, daring stunts, and massive jumps, all set against stunning aerial environments. With ultra-realistic driving physics, each race feels intense and immersive, bringing you closer to the thrill of real racing.

Key Features:

Sky-High Tracks: Race on challenging courses suspended in mid-air, where every drift and jump keeps you on edge.
Realistic Driving Experience: Feel each turn, drift, and acceleration with carefully crafted car mechanics that respond to your every move.
Dynamic Environments: Enjoy breathtaking sky vistas and detailed visuals that elevate your racing experience.
Stunts & Challenges: Tackle loops, obstacles, and ramps as you push your skills to the limit.
Optimized for the Oculus Quest 2 and 3, Sky Stunt Racer promises smooth performance and intuitive controls, making it accessible for both seasoned racers and VR newcomers. Are you ready to defy gravity and race beyond the edge?
